yield_analysis_plus 的原始碼

import os
import pandas as pd
import importlib
import matplotlib
import json
matplotlib.use('Agg')
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from generate_map import generate_map



[文件]
def load_exclusions():
    try:
        with open('cartier mask.json', 'r') as f:
            return json.load(f)
    except FileNotFoundError:
        return {}  # 返回空字典或默認值)





[文件]
def yield_analysis_plus(folder_path, calc_version):
    # 建立calc_version(站點)到calc_type(站點分析模組)的對照表

    exclusions = load_exclusions()
    
    calc_type_map = {
        "MT": "MTCartier",
        "DC2": "DC2Cartier",
        "INNER1": "INNER1Cartier",
        "RDL": "RDLCartier",
        "INNER2": "INNER2Cartier",
        "CU":"CUCartier",
        "EMC":"EMCCartier"
    }

    calc_type = calc_type_map.get(calc_version, "MT")

    # 導入對應的calculate_defects函數
    calc_module = importlib.import_module('defect_calculations')
    calculate_defects = getattr(calc_module, f'calculate_defects_{calc_type}')

    if calc_version=="MT" or calc_version=="DC2" or  calc_version=="INNER1":
        summary_data = [["Name", "Red Yield", "Green Yield", "Blue Yield", "White Yield","Missing Rate","All Defect Rate", "MTfailed Rate", "Dirty Rate", "Total Count"]]
    elif calc_version=="RDL" or calc_version=="INNER2" :
        summary_data = [["Name", "White Yield", "All Defect Rate","Dirty Rate","Viafail Rate","Shift Rate", "Hurt Rate","Blackhole Rate", "Liftofffail Rate","Total Count"]]
    else:
        summary_data = [["Name", "White Yield","All Defect Rate", "Lose Rate","Residule Rate","Can't Find Rate","Total Count"]] 
    
    red_yields = []
    green_yields = []
    blue_yields = []
    white_yields = []
    defect_yields = []
    miss_yields = []
    mtfailed_yields = []
    dirty_yields = []
    shift_yields=[]
    hurt_yields = []
    hole_yields = []
    viafail_yields = []
    liftoffail_yields = []
    lose_yields=[]
    residue_yields=[]
    cantfind_yields=[]
    

    for file_name in os.listdir(folder_path):
        if file_name.endswith('.csv'):
            file_path = os.path.join(folder_path, file_name)
            try:
                df = pd.read_csv(file_path)
                if calc_version=="EMC":
                   # Apply exclusions
                    for exclusion in exclusions:
                        start_row = int(exclusion["start_row"])
                        end_row = int(exclusion["end_row"])
                        start_col = int(exclusion["start_col"])
                        end_col = int(exclusion["end_col"])

                        # Exclude specified rows and columns
                        df = df.drop(df[(df['Row'] >= start_row) & (df['Row'] <= end_row) & (df['Col'] >= start_col) & (df['Col'] <= end_col)].index)
                        df = df.drop(df[(df['Row'] >= start_row) & (df['Row'] <= end_row) & (df['Col'] >= start_col) & (df['Col'] <= end_col)].index)
            
            except Exception as e:
                print(f"Error reading {file_name}: {e}")
                continue

            if 'DefectType' not in df.columns:
                print(f"Column 'DefectType' not found in {file_name}. Skipping this file.")
                continue

            try:
                counts = calculate_defects(df)
                if len(counts) != 9:
                    print(f"Error calculating counts in {file_name}: not enough values to unpack (expected 9, got {len(counts)})")
                    continue

                if calc_version=="MT" or calc_version=="DC2" or  calc_version=="INNER1":
                    w_count, r_count, g_count, b_count, defect_count, total_count, miss_count, mtfailed_count, dirty_count = counts
                    white_yield = w_count / total_count
                    red_yield = r_count / total_count
                    green_yield = g_count / total_count
                    blue_yield = b_count / total_count
                    defect_yield = defect_count / total_count
                    miss_yield = miss_count / total_count
                    mtfailed_yield = mtfailed_count / total_count
                    dirty_yield = dirty_count / total_count

                    red_yields.append(red_yield)
                    green_yields.append(green_yield)
                    blue_yields.append(blue_yield)
                    white_yields.append(white_yield)
                    defect_yields.append(defect_yield)
                    miss_yields.append(miss_yield)
                    mtfailed_yields.append(mtfailed_yield)
                    dirty_yields.append(dirty_yield)
                    summary_data.append([file_name[:-4], f"{red_yield:.2%}", f"{green_yield:.2%}", f"{blue_yield:.2%}", f"{white_yield:.2%}", f"{miss_yield:.2%}", f"{defect_yield:.2%}", f"{mtfailed_yield:.2%}", f"{dirty_yield:.2%}", total_count])
                
                elif calc_version=="RDL" or calc_version=="INNER2" :
                    w_count, shift_count, hurt_count, hole_count, defect_count, total_count, viafail_count, liftofffail_count, dirty_count = counts
                    white_yield = w_count / total_count
                    shift_yield = shift_count / total_count
                    hurt_yield = hurt_count / total_count
                    hole_yield = hole_count / total_count
                    defect_yield = defect_count / total_count
                    viafail_yield = viafail_count / total_count
                    liftoffail_yield = liftofffail_count / total_count
                    dirty_yield = dirty_count / total_count

                    shift_yields.append(shift_yield)
                    hurt_yields.append(hurt_yield)
                    hole_yields.append(hole_yield)
                    white_yields.append(white_yield)
                    defect_yields.append(defect_yield)
                    viafail_yields.append(viafail_yield)
                    liftoffail_yields.append(liftoffail_yield)
                    dirty_yields.append(dirty_yield)
                    summary_data.append([file_name[:-4], f"{white_yield:.2%}", f"{defect_yield:.2%}", f"{dirty_yield:.2%}", f"{viafail_yield:.2%}", f"{shift_yield:.2%}", f"{hurt_yield:.2%}", f"{hole_yield:.2%}", f"{liftoffail_yield:.2%}", total_count]) 
                else:
                    w_count,defect_count,lose_count,residue_count,cantfind_count,total_count, viafail_count, liftofffail_count, dirty_count = counts
                    white_yield = w_count / total_count
                    lose_yield = lose_count / total_count
                    residue_yield = residue_count / total_count
                    cantfind_yield = cantfind_count / total_count
                    defect_yield = defect_count / total_count

                    lose_yields.append(lose_yield)
                    residue_yields.append(residue_yield)
                    cantfind_yields.append(cantfind_yield)
                    white_yields.append(white_yield)
                    defect_yields.append(defect_yield)
                    
                    summary_data.append([file_name[:-4], f"{white_yield:.2%}", f"{defect_yield:.2%}", f"{lose_yield:.2%}", f"{residue_yield:.2%}", f"{cantfind_yield:.2%}", total_count]) 
                
                map_output_path = os.path.join(folder_path, f"{file_name[:-4]}.png")
                generate_map(df, map_output_path, calc_type)

            except Exception as e:
                print(f"Error calculating counts in {file_name}: {e}")

    if summary_data and len(summary_data) > 1:
        
        if calc_version=="MT" or calc_version=="DC2" or  calc_version=="INNER1":
            avg_red_yield = sum(red_yields) / len(red_yields) if red_yields else 0
            avg_green_yield = sum(green_yields) / len(green_yields) if green_yields else 0
            avg_blue_yield = sum(blue_yields) / len(blue_yields) if blue_yields else 0
            avg_white_yield = sum(white_yields) / len(white_yields) if white_yields else 0
            avg_defect_yield = sum(defect_yields) / len(defect_yields) if defect_yields else 0
            avg_miss_yield = sum(miss_yields) / len(miss_yields) if miss_yields else 0
            avg_mtfailed_yield = sum(mtfailed_yields) / len(mtfailed_yields) if mtfailed_yields else 0
            avg_dirty_yield = sum(dirty_yields) / len(dirty_yields) if dirty_yields else 0
            summary_data.append(["Average", f"{avg_red_yield:.2%}", f"{avg_green_yield:.2%}", f"{avg_blue_yield:.2%}", f"{avg_white_yield:.2%}", f"{avg_miss_yield:.2%}", f"{avg_defect_yield:.2%}", f"{avg_mtfailed_yield:.2%}", f"{avg_dirty_yield:.2%}"])
        
        elif calc_version=="RDL" or calc_version=="INNER2" :
            avg_shift_yield = sum(shift_yields) / len(shift_yields) if shift_yields else 0
            avg_hurt_yield = sum(hurt_yields) / len(hurt_yields) if hurt_yields else 0
            avg_hole_yield = sum(hole_yields) / len(hole_yields) if hole_yields else 0
            avg_white_yield = sum(white_yields) / len(white_yields) if white_yields else 0
            avg_defect_yield = sum(defect_yields) / len(defect_yields) if defect_yields else 0
            avg_viafail_yield = sum(viafail_yields) / len(viafail_yields) if viafail_yields else 0
            avg_liftoffail_yield = sum(liftoffail_yields) / len(liftoffail_yields) if liftoffail_yields else 0
            avg_dirty_yield = sum(dirty_yields) / len(dirty_yields) if dirty_yields else 0
            summary_data.append(["Average", f"{avg_white_yield:.2%}", f"{avg_defect_yield:.2%}", f"{avg_dirty_yield:.2%}", f"{avg_viafail_yield:.2%}", f"{avg_shift_yield:.2%}", f"{avg_hurt_yield:.2%}", f"{avg_hole_yield:.2%}", f"{avg_liftoffail_yield:.2%}"])
        
        else:
            avg_lose_yield = sum(lose_yields) / len(lose_yields) if lose_yields else 0
            avg_residue_yield = sum(residue_yields) / len(residue_yields) if residue_yields else 0
            avg_cantfind_yield = sum(cantfind_yields) / len(cantfind_yields) if cantfind_yields else 0
            avg_white_yield = sum(white_yields) / len(white_yields) if white_yields else 0
            avg_defect_yield = sum(defect_yields) / len(defect_yields) if defect_yields else 0
            summary_data.append(["Average", f"{avg_white_yield:.2%}", f"{avg_defect_yield:.2%}", f"{avg_lose_yield:.2%}", f"{avg_residue_yield:.2%}", f"{avg_cantfind_yield:.2%}"])
        
        output_file = os.path.join(folder_path, "summary.csv")
        summary_df = pd.DataFrame(summary_data[1:], columns=summary_data[0])
        summary_df.to_csv(output_file, index=False)
        print(f"Summary saved to {output_file}")

        file_names = [row[0] for row in summary_data[1:-1]]
        header = summary_data[0]  # 获取表头
        white_yield_index = header.index('White Yield')  # 找到 'White Yield' 列的索引
        # 读取 'White Yield' 列中的数值，转换为浮点数并移除百分号
        white_yields_values = [float(row[white_yield_index].strip('%')) / 100 for row in summary_data[1:-1]]

        plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
        bars = plt.bar(file_names, white_yields_values, color='skyblue')
        plt.xlabel('Wafer Name')
        plt.ylabel('White Yield')
        plt.title(f'White Yield for Each Wafer - {calc_version}')
        plt.xticks(rotation=90)

        for bar, white_yield in zip(bars, white_yields_values):
            yval = bar.get_height()
            plt.text(bar.get_x() + bar.get_width() / 2, yval, f'{white_yield:.2%}', ha='center', va='bottom', fontsize=8)

        plt.tight_layout()
        bar_plot_output_path = os.path.join(folder_path, f"{calc_version}.png")
        plt.savefig(bar_plot_output_path)
        plt.close()
        print(f"White yield bar plot saved to {bar_plot_output_path}")

        return summary_data
